snippet: As Israel sought to highlight negative portrayals of Jews in Palestinian Authority media and textbooks, Palestinians dismissed the accusation as a ruse to distract from issues like borders.
abstract: Israeli officials highlight dozens of examples of negative statements about Israel and Jews in official Palestinian Authority media and textbooks in a new presentation delivered at an Israeli cabinet meeting; meeting comes on the day Secretary of State John Kerry left Israel after an intense four-day push for a framework agreement outlining prospects for a peace deal.
lead_paragraph: As Israel sought to highlight negative portrayals of Jews in Palestinian Authority media and textbooks, Palestinians dismissed the accusation as a ruse to distract from issues like borders.

headline.main: Israeli Official Points to ‘Incitement’ by Palestinians
headline.print_headline: Israeli Official Points to ‘Incitements’ by Palestinians
